list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a straight whiskey distilled from a mash having at least 51 percent corn in addition to malt and rye.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he moved to the sideboard to pour himself a bourbon
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh di chuyển đến một bên để rót cho mình một bourbon

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a rose of a variety that flowers over a long period and has a rich scent. It arose as a natural hybrid on the island of Réunion (formerly Île de Bourbon) and was introduced into Europe in the early 19th century.
